attributes.action: Offset increases in road duty by providing tax relief for public transport companies and tax incentives for their users.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea is that increases in tax for enviromentally unfriendly activities would be balances with tax relief for environmentally sound activities. Thus a person who changes from one to the other receives a double incentive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
